column1:
body {
      width: 960px;
      margin: 0 auto 0 auto;
      box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
    }
    
    .container {
    	margin: auto;
    	padding-left: 10px;
    	padding-right: 10px;
    }
    /* HOME PAGE */
    
    section#home {
    
    	height: 400px;
    	max-width: 100%;
    	background: url(../images/homepagemain.jpg) center center no-repeat;
    	background-size: 960px;
    	background-position: center;
    	overflow: hidden;
    	
    	position: relative;
    }
    
    
    
    .showreel {
      height: 50px;
      width: 960px;
      position: absolute;
      background-color: black;
      bottom: 0;
      padding: 0 30px;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }
    
    .showreel, .showreel > div {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
    }
    
    .showreel p {
      font-size: 15px;
      font-weight: normal;
      margin: 0;
      color: #ffffff;
    }
    
    .showreel i {
      color: #ffffff;
    }
    
    .seemore i {
      margin-right: 30px;
    }
    
    .seeour i {
      margin-left: 30px;
    }
